132.movie_plot: Pregnant Sally unknowingly falls for the stepson of the deceased father of her baby and has to deal with his homicidal family.

65.movie_plot: This installment of Chan's Police Story series has our hero trying to locate a missing nuclear warhead.

17.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.
